title: [Slither Creek]
description: The creek overflows its banks slightly, making the banks sodden, but not impossible to climb.  Beneath your feet, bright green slime covers the bottom, easily seen in the shallow water.  From the east a slight hum reaches your ears, unpleasantly familiar.
